_README.description: Model metadata for the DIAL (Data & AI Layer) aggregation provider.
_README.usage: Models listed here are exposed through the DIAL provider. Aliases are case-insensitive.

field_descriptions.model_name: The model identifier as exposed by DIAL (typically deployment name)
field_descriptions.aliases: Array of shorthand names users can type instead of the full model name
field_descriptions.context_window: Total number of tokens the model can process (input + output combined)
field_descriptions.max_output_tokens: Maximum number of tokens the model can generate in a single response
field_descriptions.supports_extended_thinking: Whether the model supports extended reasoning tokens
field_descriptions.supports_json_mode: Whether the model can guarantee valid JSON output
field_descriptions.supports_function_calling: Whether the model supports function/tool calling
field_descriptions.supports_images: Whether the model can process images/visual input
field_descriptions.max_image_size_mb: Maximum total size in MB for all images combined
field_descriptions.supports_temperature: Whether the model accepts the temperature parameter
field_descriptions.intelligence_score: 1-20 human rating used as the primary signal for auto-mode ordering
